description: Manage nat rule in a virtual network gateway.

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule add
commands.summary: Add nat rule in a virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway nat-rule add --external-mappings
                                     --gateway-name
                                     --internal-mappings
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--ip-config-id]
                                     [--mode {EgressSnat, IngressSnat}]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--type {Dynamic, Static}]
examples: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule add --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway --name Nat --internal-mappings 10.4.0.0/24 --external-mappings 192.168.21.0/24

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule list
commands.summary: List nat rule for a virtual network gateway.
examples: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule remove
commands.summary: Remove nat rule from a virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway nat-rule remove --gateway-name
                                        --name
                                        --resource-group
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule remove --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway --name Nat

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway nat-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
